m_szDocTitle: Introducing The Ego, An Electric, 3D Printed Superbike
m_szDocSumamry: Originally published on Gas2 . By Christopher DeMorro. While robots have replaced people on many production lines, the next-generation of automotive assembly will come with the 3D printer revolution. Italian motorcycle maker CRP has gotten a jump-start on this new production trend by printing an all-electric superbike. One day, all our motorcycles and automobiles might be made the same way. Using selective laser sintering and polyamide-based materials reinforced with carbon fiber called Windform, CRP joined forces with F1 technologies to print this lightweight, zero-emissions electric motorcyc
